name: jspass
description: JavaScript implementation of standard UNIX password manager pass.

scripts.bundle: browserify --external https -p browserify-derequire --standalone JSPass -o dist/bundle src/jspass
scripts.doc: jsdoc -d ./doc/ src/jspass.js src/password.js src/directory.js src/util.js src/unlocked-keyring.js src/git/github-api.js

author: Michal Chroust
